args:
After saving Peony from the black mana,
the prince's party makes use of her powers
to return to the waking world. Peony's words
confirm that it is indeed Thórr who has set
events into motion, but they'll need more
information before they can track her down.
Peony, please! You have to wake up!
You're Peony, the Sweet Dream!\nYou're a kindly ljósálfar who brings\npleasant dreams to mortals!

Yes... Pleasant dreams...
But grown-ups are bad dreams.
Nightmares. We need them gone
if we want to have happy dreams.
I mean, yes, perhaps some grown-ups\nsteal dreams from children—but there\nare others who fight to protect them!
When we first met, you told me we were\ngoing to get along splendidly, remember?
Even though you were a ljósálfar\nand I was an adult woman!
I...would never say such a thing.\nAdults are miserable little mortals\nwho have forgotten how to dream.
I know you don't believe that!
I still remember everything\nyou told me that day...

You said mortals are pure and innocent
when they're children, but forget how
to dream as they grow up and become
more focused on reality.
But you also said it had to be that way\nbecause we'd never survive if we were\ndreaming all the time.
You said that even though we forget about\nyou when we grow up, you still care about\nall of us. Don't you remember that?
Please tell me you remember!\nI couldn't bear it if you forgot me!
What...happened to me? There was\na dark fog and then... I don't know.\nI can't remember anything else.
It's okay, Peony. It doesn't matter now.\nYou were just having a really bad dream.
Oh, we ARE in a dream, aren't we?\n...Er, but not in Ljósálfheimr.
I think that's the case, yes. Anyway, Peony,\ndo you know a way to get us out of here?
Have you tried going to sleep?
But we are already in a dream!
Which means we ARE asleep, yes?\nGoodness, but this is confusing.
Look, it doesn't need to make sense.\nJust let your brain spill out your ears\nand take off for Snoozytown.
This is clearly quite simple for you.\nI wish I could say the same.
Now, shall we all go nighty-night?
Is this...where we were before?\nHey, wake up! We're back!
I suppose you're the one we have\nto thank for our safe return.
Well, it was the least that I could do,\nseeing as how I caused all that trouble.
I suppose you already know this,\nbut I'm Peony, a ljósálfar from\nthe dream land of Ljósálfheimr.
I'm {player_name}, the seventh\nscion of Alberia. It's a pleasure.
I know we've only just met, Peony,\nbut can I ask you a few things?
Wait! Lemme guess! You want to know\nwhere to find Thórr, right?

Hee! Yeah, Sharena filled me in while you
were asleep. Anyway, I feel like I've MET
Thórr, but my memories are all jumbled
and hazy, so I can't be certain. Sorry.
I understand. For now, I hope you'll\njoin us at the Halidom for a while?
Hey, we faeries gotta stick together!\nEr, or we faeries and lost...jam...farms...\nWhatever you are. Anyway, I'm Notte!
Hee hee! Oh, but it is delightful to meet\na faerie of the waking world.
The thrill is all mine, sister!
Oh, that is adorable. Are we certain\nwe're out of the world of dreams?!
